flaws.name: Xeno
flaws.effect: No other warband member will heal them for any reason

flaws.name: Dead Man Walking
flaws.effect: Death Saves are always at least DR10

flaws.name: Ratman
flaws.effect: Must bring cheese with them everywhere

flaws.name: Crazed
flaws.effect: If warband member fails a morale test, they attack nearest model (friend or foe)

flaws.name: Broken
flaws.effect: Warband member suffers -1 to all tests

flaws.name: Late
flaws.effect: Do not set up warband member at start of Scenario. They turn up at start of Round 2

flaws.name: Purge
flaws.effect: Warband member will only use weapons with Burn keyword

flaws.name: Weak Bones
flaws.effect: Warband member can only use Armor of value 1 or less

feats.name: Marine
feats.effect: If using weapon with Reload keyword, they reload for free

feats.name: Zealous
feats.effect: Never fails morale checks, ignores rolls for morale

feats.name: Unpainted
feats.effect: Looks like statue. Monsters ignore them until they attack the monster

feats.name: Rogue
feats.effect: Deals 1D4 additional damage if either attacking or defending model is in shadow of terrain

feats.name: TNT
feats.effect: Starts every Scenario with Black Powder Bomb or Space Grenade

feats.name: Gambler
feats.effect: Can reroll dice but if they fail on second roll, result is considered Fumble

feats.name: Mother of Crows
feats.effect: As action, summon crows to attack another model. Target takes 2 HP damage if they fail Agility test

feats.name: Skulls
feats.effect: Carries skull at all times. Takes no Equipment slots, can be used as Makeshift Weapon

feats.name: BiblioTech
feats.effect: Player can pick any Feat from any Forbidden Psalm game they own. [Reroll if don't own any]

feats.name: Undead
feats.effect: Cannot be healed by potions, but immune to Disease, Bleeding, and Poison. Auto-passes Death Saves

flaws: Ratman + Cheese: Must always carry cheese (automatic equipment)
Purge + Weapon Selection: Limits weapon choices to Burn weapons only
Late + Deployment: Changes setup timing for affected model
feats: Marine + Reload Weapons: Eliminates reload movement penalty
TNT + Equipment: Free explosive each Scenario (if slots available)
BiblioTech + Other Games: Allows cross-game feat selection
Undead + Healing: Changes healing mechanics significantly

pastTech: Rogue: Benefits from medieval terrain (castle shadows, etc.)
futureTech: Marine: Excellent with Pulse Rifle, Plas-mar
BiblioTech: Can access cyberpunk/sci-fi feats from other games
